original_text: They also put two robbers on crosses near to Jesus. One robber was on Jesus' right side. The other robber was on his left side. 28 [The Bible says that this would happen. It says, ‘People thought of him as someone who did not obey God's Law.’]
korean_text: 강도 둘을 예수와 함께 십자가에 못 박으니 하나는 그의 우편에, 하나는 좌편에 있더라

sentences.original_text: They also put two robbers on crosses
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 또한 두 강도를 십자가에 못 박았다

sentences.original_text: One robber was on Jesus' right side
The other robber was on his left side
The Bible says that this would happen
as someone who did not obey God's Law
